channel.title: MechWarrior Living Legends 0.4.1
channel.description:
For any interested, MWLL has just released their first version for Crysis Wars.
[url='https://www.mechlivinglegends.net/2010-12/mechwarrior-living-legends-open-beta-0-4-0-released/']https://www.mechlivinglegends.net/2010-12/mechwarrior-living-legends-open-beta-0-4-0-released/[/url]
New Terrain Control game mode, Thor (Summoner) mech, Hephaestus hover, Morrigu tank, new weapons and new maps.

item.title: MechWarrior Living Legends 0.4.1
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
I think they are planning on making a single player in the future, but having an

MP beta just makes it easier to get an all around functioning mod with many

assets done, so afterwords they can worry about things like story,

mission-based level design, and AI coding. But that’s way in the future, so - I

wouldn’t hold my breath for that.

It is a pretty good mod though, very MW like.

Read full topic

item.title: MechWarrior Living Legends 0.4.1
item.dc:creator: Daedalus
item.description:
Samapico:

That’s a multiplayer only mod, right? I was interested in it during its development, but I’d prefer something with a single-player campaign…

Yeah my thoughts exactly. I never got into the multiplayer of the Mechwarrior games. Honestly, too much games and mods are multiplayer focussed these days. Give me a good old story driven singleplayer anytime.

Read full topic
